title: Echoes of A Closed Door - A life lived following a stroke
description: Carol Fuller tells the inspirational story of how she and her husband dealt with the aftermaths of his sudden and debilitating stroke, and how they embraced their different life together.A story told from the heart covering a 21-year period, Echoes of A Closed Door is one of the few books that, in a personal way, demonstrates to readers how to keep an open mind and positive attitude to enable them to fully appreciate the extent to which a stroke impacts on life.
author: Carol Rosemary Fuller
